docs.lead_paragraph: EIN KEREM, Israel, Jan. 29-- Hadassah, the American women's Zionist organization, has completed the design stage for a mountain village here. The village will become the college town of Israel's medical profession and also a model of community planning.

headline.main: HADASSAH PLANS SPECIAL VILLAGE; Israeli Mountain Site to Be Medical College Town and a Model Community Coupling of Homes Possible To Provide All Facilities

docs.abstract: Hadassah plans model community Ein Kerem, to house staff; L D Lasker, A Mayer aid planning; Dr Mann discusses Center med projects and plans
docs.snippet: EIN KEREM, Israel, Jan. 29-- Hadassah, the American women's Zionist organization, has completed the design stage for a mountain village here. The village will become the college town of Israel's medical profession and also a model of community...

byline.original: By HARRY GILROY Special to The New York Times
